  • Constructor Details

    • ButtonSprite

      public ButtonSprite(String label)
      makes a button with an aspect to fit the text. By default, the button does not change aspect when the button's text changes.
      Parameters:
      label - text for the button

    • ButtonSprite

      public ButtonSprite(String label, double aspect)
      makes a button with a given aspect ratio of width/height. By default, the button does not change aspect when the button's text changes.
      Parameters:
      label - text for the button
      aspect - the ratio of width/height of the oval

  • Method Details

    • raise

      public void raise()
      sets the color of the button when it is up

    • lower

      public void lower()
      sets the color of the button when it is down

    • setTextColor

      public void setTextColor(Color textColor)
      sets the color of the text on the button
      Parameters:
      textColor - the color for the text and the oval underneath

    • setButtonColor

      public void setButtonColor(Color buttonColor)
      sets the color of the top oval of the button
      Parameters:
      buttonColor - the color for the top oval of the button

    • executePressAction

      public void executePressAction()
      calls the methods of all Alarms and ActionListeners that have been added to the button

    • addAlarm

      public void addAlarm(Alarm... a)
      adds an alarm to the button. The alarm will be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the alarm to call when the button is clicked

    • removeAlarm

      public void removeAlarm(Alarm... a)
      removes the alarm from the button. The alarm removed will no longer be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the alarm to remove

    • addTimedAction

      public void addTimedAction(AlarmAdapter... a)
      adds an alarm to the button. The alarm will be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the alarm to call when the button is clicked

    • removeTimedAction

      public void removeTimedAction(AlarmAdapter... a)
      removes the alarm from the button. The alarm removed will no longer be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the alarm to remove

    • addActionListener

      public void addActionListener(ActionListener... a)
      adds a listener to the button. The listener will be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the listener to call when the button is clicked

    • removeActionListener

      public void removeActionListener(ActionListener... a)
      removes the listener from the button. The listener removed will no longer be called when the button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      a - the listener to remove

    • enable

      public void enable(GameLoop loop)
      enables all players to click on the button
      Parameters:
      loop - the game

    • enable

      public void enable(Mouse... m)
      enables the specified mouse to interact with the button
      Parameters:
      m - the mouse to enable interactions with

    • disable

      public void disable()
      disables clicking on the button

    • disable

      public void disable(Mouse... m)
      enables the specified mouse to interact with the button
      Parameters:
      m - the mouse to enable interactions with

    • getText

      public String getText()
      gets the text on the button
      Returns:
      the text on the face of the button

    • setText

      public void setText(String t)
      sets the text on the button. This may reduce or increase the size of the font based upon the length of the string.
      Parameters:
      t -
